content.p: We are a leading international centre of postgraduate teaching and research with a wide variety of expertise to support your studies. History MA Research degrees Postgraduate students form an integral part of our community and are encouraged to take part in all aspects of department life. Our innovative research-led approach to teaching will not only make your experience an exciting and challenging one, it will also provide you with the skills you need for a rewarding and successful career. Doing a masters at Nottingham has pushed me to not only improve the content of my academic writing, but make use of the terrific opportunities here for scholarships and careers support. More information on our research specialisms, projects, centres and networks Find out more about facilities including libraries, archives and digital resources Find out more about funding opportunities including grants and studentships Find out more about personal and academic support available Research seminars and events in the Department of History Find out about possible career paths for history graduates Contact details Twitter
